entry.title: Heat Advisory issued July 02 at 3:32AM PDT until July 05 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TUESDAY TO 11 PM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Maximum temperatures of 92 to 102 degrees expected Tuesday and Wednesday. Hottest temperatures will be across inner portions of the Portland, Vancouver, Hillsboro, and Salem metropolitan areas.

entry.title: Fire Weather Watch issued July 02 at 3:10AM PDT until July 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR OKANOGAN VALLEY AND WATERVILLE PLATEAU... The National Weather Service in Spokane has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Monday morning through Monday evening.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 7:35AM PDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...INCREASING HEAT NEXT WEEK...
